name: Epiphany Center
description: The Epiphany Center seeks to strengthen family life with holistic substance abuse and trauma recovery services for women and their young children. and more information can be found here: https://www.theepiphanycenter.org Rooted in the tradition of service of our founders, the Daughters of Charity of St. Vincent de Paul, we work to heal the trauma caused by addiction, mental illness, homelessness and poverty and give families the skills they need for a lifetime of recovery.
